description: Dieser Cache ist der Flitterwochen Cache von Haggi+Denise. Denn in Dresden habe ich meine Frau kennengelernt und hier verbrachten wir unsere Flitterwochen.Der Cache ist recht gut zugänglich. Bitte versteckt und tarnt ihn wieder gut.Wir wünschen euch viel Spass beim Suchen. Haggi+Denise Bitte keine Trackables im Cache ablegen! Es sind hier in der jüngeren Vergangenheit Trackables verloren gegangen.© olimic, Opencaching.de, CC BY-NC-ND, Stand: 24.04.2018;alle Logeinträge © jeweiliger Autor
name: Flitterwochen Cache Waldpark von olimic
logs: Kamel12 / 29.03.2018 / gefundenSchnell gefunden.

sierrakilo / 04.04.2017 12:25 / gefundenFür diesen Dresdenbesuch ebenfalls der letzte Fund vor der Abreise (bis zum nächsten Mal). Nach kurzer Suche gefunden und dann noch einen Spaziergang durch den Waldpark gemacht.

weltengreif / 28.12.2016 / gefundenI recently decided that this holiday season it was time to finish off the Deutschlandtour series. Hence, first of all, a trip to beautiful Dresden was on the menu, in order to find #16. An overnight train ride brought me there, and, after a night in a B&B, this was my MO for the return journey. There was also a brief detour to the Czech Rep as well as some D5 business. The weather was pretty foul, particularly on the first day, so I was rather glad when I chanced upon an outdoor shop and was able to buy myself some rain trous - something I hadn't managed at home. There were also quite a considerable number of DNFs logged. However, the most irritating aspect of this trip were challenges with additional puzzles - though I can see how this may have helped owners avoid 161m conflicts (honi soit ...) All in all, it still ended up being a successful trip, and I still think I might move here one day.Quick take on the way around town.TFTC!Cache #6059 (approx.)Found on 28. Dezember 2016 at 20:55
